text: "Rhinoceros" is a 1991 song from American band the Smashing Pumpkins and taken from their debut studio album Gish. It wasn't released as a single and instead featured as the leading single from Lull (EP). == Track listing == All songs written by Billy Corgan == References == Category:1991 songs Category:The Smashing Pumpkins songs Category:Psychedelic rock songs Category:Dream pop songs
title: Rhinoceros (song)
